## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                    | Type                                                                                                | Default     |
| ---------    | ---------    | --------------------------     | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `size`       | `size`       | The size of the button.        | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                                                                    | `'medium'`  |
| `standalone` | `standalone` | The link is standalone or not. | `"true" \| "false"`                                                                                 | `'false'`   |
